name: Campus Ambassador
description: Be the face of Intern2Grow in your university or just on social media.

name: UI Developer
description: Convert figma designs into web pages, and make sure that everything is responsive.

name: JavaScript Frontend Developer
description: Fix frontend related bugs and add new features to the website.

name: React.js Developer
description: Fix frontend related bugs and add new features to the website.

name: Data Analyst
description: You will be given a small dataset and a set of questions to answer using that data. You will be expected to use your data analysis skills to answer the questions and present your findings in a clear and concise manner.

name: UI/UX Designer
description: Turn ideas into UI/UX designs, and redesign existing websites.

name: Mobile Developer
description: Convert UI/UX figma designs into fully functional mobile applications.

name: Console Programmer
description: Build console applications with your favorite programming language to solve certain problems.

name: Web Scraping Specialist
description: Write programs that can harvest/extract data from certain websites.

name: Graphic Designer
description: Design logos, banners, and social media posts.
